calcSpendingLimit() - Method in class CreditCard
Calculates the credit card's spending limit.
CreditCard - Class in Unnamed Package
The CreditCard class represents a credit card with attributes such as card number, spending limit, amount spent as well as methods for payments and reward point calculations.
CreditCard(int, Customer, CreditCardType) - Constructor for class CreditCard
Default constructor that initializes the CreditCard object with a customer, account number, and card type.
